entry.title: Combined summary - Analyzing mathematical / scientific sanity of XT's foundation (BIP101)
entry.summary: The email is a request from an outside non-Bitcoin developer who wishes to establish peaceful cooperation between the non-XT and XT community by reading BIP101, which proposes a fixed function for block size growth. The developer requests plots of the measurements of the natural data and the model function to determine whether BIP101 is adequate. The central question is whether the natural source data has revealed its saturation curve to guess its defining constants. If it hasn't, it is questionable whether BIP101 is adequate. The author elaborates on mathematical problems due to the absence of plots in the BIP101 document.The developer also expresses concern about the lack of scientific evidence provided in the BIP101 document, particularly with regards to the absence of plots. Finally, the developer requests that the XT community be open to scientifically admitting that BIP101 might be insufficient if the plots show open questions. In summary, the email highlights the importance of considering scientific evidence and providing adequate data when proposing changes to the Bitcoin protocol.
